messages.content: You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have handled the most orders?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of units ordered per supplier?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalUnitsOrdered FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has the highest number of sales orders processed?
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order value for March 2023?

SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the product with the highest inventory turnover ratio.

SELECT ProductID, (SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(products.UnitsInStock)) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY InventoryTurnoverRatio DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the most ordered product in the past month.

SELECT TOP 1 p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSalesQuantity FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE od.OrderDate >= DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE()) GROUP BY p.ProductID ORDER BY TotalSalesQuantity DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many employees have handled orders that were shipped late?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS LateOrders FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate GROUP BY EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount offered on all products?
SELECT AVG(Discount) FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have been discontinued, and what are their current stock levels?
SELECT ProductName, UnitsInStock FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which month had the highest total freight costs?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY TotalFreightCost DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of distinct shipping companies used?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ShipVia) AS DistinctShippingCompanies FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were handled by each employee per region?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, o.ShipRegion, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, o.ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product has the highest performance score based on sales?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS PerformanceScore FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY PerformanceScore DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed by each customer?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the employees who have been hired in the last year.
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE HireDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order quantity across all orders?
SELECT AVG([Order Details].Quantity) AS Average_Quantity FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which orders have used the most expensive freight?
SELECT OrderID, Freight FROM orders ORDER BY Freight DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the top 3 regions with the highest shipping costs year-to-date in 2023.
SELECT ShipRegion, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND CURDATE() GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY TotalFreight DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the on-time delivery rate for the past six months?

SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, (SUM(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(OrderID)) * 100 AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) GROUP BY MONTH(OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
For each supplier, what is the total quantity of products supplied?
SELECT p.SupplierID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalQuantitySupplied FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the frequency of orders placed by each customer?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderFrequency FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY OrderFrequency DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many suppliers have a lead time of more than 30 days?

SELECT COUNT(suppliers.SupplierID) AS num_suppliers FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) > 30
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the most frequently ordered product.

SELECT products.ProductName, COUNT([Order Details].OrderID) AS OrderFrequency FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductName ORDER BY OrderFrequency DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify suppliers who have provided products with more than 10% discount on average.
SELECT s.CompanyName FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY s.CompanyName HAVING AVG(od.Discount) > 0.1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify products that have been ordered with a discount greater than 10%.
SELECT ProductID FROM [Order Details] WHERE Discount > 0.10;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given on orders per product?
SELECT ProductID, AVG(Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products are currently on order and need replenishment?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsOnOrder > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of products sold per country in 2023?

SELECT orders.ShipCountry, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY orders.ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping company had the highest on-time delivery rate in the last quarter?

SELECT ShipVia, SUM(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeRate FROM orders WHERE QUARTER(OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) AND YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY OnTimeRate DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the month with the highest total sales.

SELECT YEAR(OrderDate) AS Year, MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY Year, Month ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all products with no orders placed in the last three months.

SELECT p.ProductID FROM products p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE od.ProductID = p.ProductID AND o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH));
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which month has the highest number of orders?
SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS OrderMonth, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY MONTH(OrderDate) ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify categories that consist of discontinued products.
SELECT DISTINCT CategoryID FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer placed the most orders?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of units in stock for each product category?
SELECT CategoryID, SUM(UnitsInStock) AS TotalUnitsInStock FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which order took the longest to fulfill?
SELECT OrderID, DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate) AS FulfillmentTime FROM orders ORDER BY FulfillmentTime DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee fulfilled the most orders last month?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrdersFulfilled FROM orders WHERE MONTH(OrderDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) - 1 GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY OrdersFulfilled DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed but not yet shipped as of March 2023?
SELECT COUNT(o.OrderID) FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NULL AND o.OrderDate <= '2023-03-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the product with the highest average discount in 2022.

SELECT od.ProductID, AVG(od.Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY od.ProductID ORDER BY AvgDiscount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products are most commonly associated with discounts?
SELECT od.ProductID, COUNT(*) AS DiscountedOrderCount FROM [Order Details] od WHERE od.Discount > 0 GROUP BY od.ProductID ORDER BY DiscountedOrderCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the customer lifetime value for each customer.

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS CustomerLifetimeValue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost for orders shipped via each method?
SELECT ShipVia, AVG(Freight) AS AvgFreight FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales for each product?
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average time taken to fulfill an order for each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time per shipping company?
SELECT shippers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_fulfillment_time FROM orders JOIN shippers ON orders.ShipVia = shippers.ShipperID GROUP BY shippers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost incurred for orders shipped to each country?
SELECT ShipCountry, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 products in terms of sales that were shipped internationally?

SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE o.ShipCountry <> 'LocalCountry' GROUP BY p.ProductID, p.ProductName ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all products with a unit price greater than a specific value.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitPrice > 50;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the employee responsible for overseeing the most orders in 2023.
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many unique customers have made repeat purchases in the last six months?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) AS repeat_customers FROM (SELECT CustomerID FROM orders WHERE OrderDate > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) GROUP BY CustomerID HAVING COUNT(OrderID) > 1) AS repeat_customer_ids
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total discounted amount for all orders?
SELECT SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice * Discount) AS TotalDiscountedAmount FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given per order?
SELECT AVG(od.Discount) AS AvgDiscountPerOrder FROM [Order Details] od;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the top 5 customers in terms of freight costs this year.
SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Freight) FROM orders WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY SUM(Freight) DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have never been ordered?
SELECT ProductID FROM products WHERE ProductID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT ProductID FROM [Order Details]);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 products with the highest average discounts?
SELECT ProductID, AVG(Discount) AS AverageDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY AverageDiscount DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time for March 2023?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) FROM orders o WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue per supplier?
SELECT p.SupplierID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS SupplierRevenue FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How do customer demographics influence purchasing patterns and retention rates?

SELECT customerDemographics.CustomerDesc, AVG(SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount))) AS avg_lifetime_value FROM customers JOIN customerCustomerDemo ON customers.CustomerID = customerCustomerDemo.CustomerID JOIN customerDemographics ON customerCustomerDemo.CustomerTypeID = customerDemographics.CustomerTypeID JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customerDemographics.CustomerDesc
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping companies have the lowest average delivery times?
SELECT shippers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_delivery_time FROM orders JOIN shippers ON orders.ShipVia = shippers.ShipperID GROUP BY shippers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost incurred each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the average discount applied in all orders.
SELECT AVG(Discount) FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products have been ordered with discounts?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) FROM [Order Details] WHERE Discount > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 regions in terms of total sales revenue?

SELECT ShipRegion, SUM(OD.UnitPrice * OD.Quantity * (1 - OD.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders O JOIN [Order Details] OD ON O.OrderID = OD.OrderID GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the least common shipping method in use.
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(*) AS Count FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY Count ASC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost for each shipping country?
SELECT ShipCountry, AVG(Freight) AS AvgFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify products with a turnover ratio higher than 5 in the last month.

SELECT products.ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(UnitsInStock) AS Turnover FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID WHERE MONTH([Order Details].OrderDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR([Order Details].OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) GROUP BY products.ProductID HAVING Turnover > 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the lead time for orders shipped in March 2023.
SELECT o.OrderID, DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate) AS LeadTime FROM orders o WHERE MONTH(o.ShippedDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.ShippedDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products have a reorder level greater than their current stock?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE ReorderLevel > UnitsInStock;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee managed the most number of orders?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 5 customers based on the number of orders.
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumOrders FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY NumOrders DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product category has the highest total sales?

SELECT c.CategoryID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID GROUP BY c.CategoryID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the correlation between unit price and sales quantity.
SELECT p.ProductID, CORR(p.UnitPrice, od.Quantity) AS PriceQuantityCorrelation FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the order details for products with a unit price above $50.
SELECT products.ProductName, [Order Details].UnitPrice FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID WHERE [Order Details].UnitPrice > 50;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the month with the highest average shipping cost in 2022.
SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, AVG(Freight) AS AverageFreight FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY Month ORDER BY AverageFreight DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were shipped by each employee?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrdersShipped FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify any orders that received a discount greater than 20%.
SELECT DISTINCT OrderID FROM [Order Details] WHERE Discount > 0.2;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders shipped to each country?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(*) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which order had the highest total cost including discount?

SELECT [Order Details].OrderID, SUM(([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount))) AS TotalCost FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY [Order Details].OrderID ORDER BY TotalCost DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the correlation between product price and quantity sold.
SELECT CORR(p.UnitPrice, od.Quantity) FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have sales exceeding their reorder level?
SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID HAVING SUM(od.Quantity) > p.ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping company is used most frequently?
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(OrderID) AS UsageCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY UsageCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders placed last quarter?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalOrders FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) AND CURDATE();
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time for each shipping method?
SELECT ShipVia, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many unique customers are there in each region?
SELECT Region, COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM customers GROUP BY Region;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products have never been ordered?
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE ProductID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT ProductID FROM [Order Details]);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify products that have been ordered in quantities greater than 100.
SELECT DISTINCT ProductID FROM [Order Details] WHERE Quantity > 100;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has the highest number of unique customers?
SELECT City, COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM customers GROUP BY City ORDER BY UniqueCustomers DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List products with a unit price higher than the average unit price of all products.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitPrice > (SELECT AVG(UnitPrice) FROM products);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the total freight cost per country.
SELECT ShipCountry, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have never reached their reorder level?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product had the highest total sales last month?

SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) = YEAR(od.OrderDate) AND MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) = MONTH(od.OrderDate) GROUP BY p.ProductID, p.ProductName ORDER BY SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the percentage of orders with a discount greater than 10%?
SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN od.Discount > 0.1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 AS DiscountedOrderPercentage FROM [Order Details] od;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List orders that had no discounts applied.
SELECT DISTINCT o.OrderID FROM orders o LEFT JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE od.Discount = 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the most commonly ordered product.
SELECT ProductID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 3 products in terms of sales revenue?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS ProductSales FROM [Order Details] od GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY ProductSales DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the on-time delivery rate for each month.
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') as Month, SUM(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(OrderID) as OnTimeRate FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average supplier lead time for each supplier.
SELECT p.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgLeadTime FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.OrderID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has the highest average sales per order?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, AVG(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS AvgSalesPerOrder FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY AvgSalesPerOrder DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Compare the product performance of discontinued vs. non-discontinued products.

SELECT products.Discontinued, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY products.Discontinued
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue generated last month?

SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND LAST_DAY(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied by each employee on their orders?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of shipments per city?
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which country has the highest number of orders?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average number of units in stock for active (non-discontinued) products?
SELECT AVG(UnitsInStock) FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 0;

What is the correlation between the average order value and customer retention rate?

SELECT (AVG(SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT orders.OrderID))) AS average_order_value, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FROM orders WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN 'start_date' AND 'end_date') / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FROM orders WHERE orders.OrderDate < 'start_date') AS customer_retention_rate FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?

SELECT SUM(o.Freight) FROM orders o WHERE o.ShipCountry = 'USA' AND MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied to all order details?
SELECT AVG(Discount) AS Average_Discount FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How effective are promotions, given customer retention rates and average order values?

SELECT campaigns.CampaignID, (COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FILTER (WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN campaigns.StartDate AND campaigns.EndDate))::float / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FILTER (WHERE orders.OrderDate < campaigns.StartDate), 0) AS retention_rate, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS avg_order_value FROM campaigns JOIN orders ON orders.CampaignID = campaigns.CampaignID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY campaigns.CampaignID

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName;

SELECT s.CompanyName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS Total_Revenue FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY s.SupplierID ORDER BY Total_Revenue DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT cd.CustomerDesc, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderFrequency, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / COUNT(o.OrderID) AS AvgOrderValue FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID JOIN customerCustomerDemo ccd ON c.CustomerID = ccd.CustomerID JOIN customerDemographics cd ON ccd.CustomerTypeID = cd.CustomerTypeID GROUP BY cd.CustomerDesc

SELECT p.ProductID FROM products p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE od.ProductID = p.ProductID AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()));

SELECT CONCAT(f.Fulfilled, ' : ', u.Unfulfilled) AS Ratio FROM (SELECT COUNT(o.OrderID) AS Fulfilled FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL AND o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31') f, (SELECT COUNT(o.OrderID) AS Unfulfilled FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NULL AND o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31') u;

You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average delivery time for each supplier?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS AvgLeadTime FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have shipped orders with a freight cost exceeding $500?
SELECT employees.EmployeeID FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE orders.Freight > 500 GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the employee with the most diverse sales portfolio based on product IDs.

SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) AS ProductDiversity FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY ProductDiversity DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were fulfilled on or before the required date in Q1 2023?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate <= o.RequiredDate AND o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 most expensive products currently available?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 0 ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product contributed the most to total sales in 2022?

SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS ProductSales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY od.ProductID ORDER BY ProductSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average fulfillment time for orders each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the percentage of sales contributed by each employee.

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) / (SELECT SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID) * 100 AS SalesPercentage FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average time to fulfill an order in different regions?
SELECT ShipRegion, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the supplier with the most on-order units.

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, SUM(products.UnitsOnOrder) AS TotalOnOrder FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID ORDER BY TotalOnOrder DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the product with the most units on order.
SELECT ProductName FROM products ORDER BY UnitsOnOrder DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the customer retention rate for the last fiscal quarter.

SELECT ((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31') / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate < '2023-01-01')) * 100 AS RetentionRate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders have been placed in each country?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(DISTINCT OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top products based on sales and inventory levels?

SELECT products.ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS total_sales, products.UnitsInStock FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductID ORDER BY total_sales DESC, products.UnitsInStock DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total value of the products in stock?
SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * UnitsInStock) AS TotalStockValue FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify underperforming products that have low sales but high stock.
SELECT ProductName FROM products LEFT JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY ProductName HAVING SUM([Order Details].Quantity) < products.UnitsInStock;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all customers who had a discount greater than 25% on any order.
SELECT DISTINCT o.CustomerID FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE od.Discount > 0.25;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top-selling products handled by each employee.

SELECT orders.EmployeeID, [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID, [Order Details].ProductID ORDER BY TotalQuantity DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top five best-selling products?
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSold FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalSold DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many discontinued products are still in stock?
SELECT ProductName, UnitsInStock FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1 AND UnitsInStock > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify suppliers that have not shipped any orders this year.

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, suppliers.CompanyName FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID LEFT JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID LEFT JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE orders.OrderID IS NULL OR YEAR(orders.ShippedDate) != YEAR(CURRENT_DATE);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given across all products?
SELECT AVG(Discount) FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which regions have the highest average order value?
SELECT o.ShipRegion, AVG(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS AvgOrderValue FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY o.ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the order that took the longest to ship.
SELECT OrderID, DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate) AS ShippingTime FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ShippingTime DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the most profitable product based on revenue.
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the total number of discontinued products supplied by each supplier.
SELECT s.CompanyName, COUNT(p.ProductID) AS DiscontinuedCount FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID WHERE p.Discontinued = 1 GROUP BY s.CompanyName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the relationship between freight cost and order size?
SELECT o.OrderID, o.Freight, SUM(od.Quantity) AS OrderSize FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY o.OrderID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the percentage of orders with a discount applied.
SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN Discount > 0 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 AS DiscountedOrdersPercentage FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of orders are delivered on-time monthly?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, (COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) / COUNT(OrderID)) * 100 AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated per product?
SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] od GROUP BY od.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have the highest discount?
SELECT ProductID, MAX(Discount) AS MaxDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY MaxDiscount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping time for orders delivered to the USA?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS Average_Shipping_Time FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'USA';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the highest selling product by quantity sold.
SELECT ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalSold FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalSold DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average discount applied per order.
SELECT AVG(Discount) FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which countries have the highest average shipping cost per order and how do their sales compare?

SELECT orders.ShipCountry, AVG(orders.Freight) AS avg_shipping_cost, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.ShipCountry ORDER BY avg_shipping_cost DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all orders with a required date in the next week.
SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE RequiredDate BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products need to be reordered based on current stock levels?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customers have more than 10 orders and what is their average freight cost?
SELECT CustomerID, AVG(Freight) AS AvgFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID HAVING COUNT(OrderID) > 10;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 5 customers by lifetime value.

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS LifetimeValue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID ORDER BY LifetimeValue DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total order value for each customer?

SELECT c.CustomerID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalOrderValue FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY c.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of orders are delivered on or before the required date?
SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) / COUNT(OrderID)) * 100 AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average delay time for all shipments shipped after the required date?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, RequiredDate)) AS AvgDelayTime FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping company has the best on-time delivery rate?
SELECT ShipVia, (SUM(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(OrderID)) * 100 AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY OnTimeDeliveryRate DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers supply products that have been discontinued?
SELECT DISTINCT SupplierID FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the monthly inventory turnover ratio?

SELECT MONTH(o.OrderDate) AS OrderMonth, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / NULLIF(AVG(p.UnitsInStock), 0) AS InventoryTurnover FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID GROUP BY OrderMonth;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed by each customer last year?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumOrders FROM orders WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - 1 GROUP BY CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee handled the most orders in 2023?
SELECT o.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders o WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY o.EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify customers with at least 5 orders.
SELECT customers.CustomerID FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID HAVING COUNT(orders.OrderID) >= 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders are pending shipment for each employee?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS PendingOrders FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NULL GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List employees along with the number of unique products they have sold.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS UniqueProducts FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the supplier with the most products in stock.
SELECT SupplierID, SUM(UnitsInStock) AS TotalStock FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY TotalStock DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee had an unusual spike in sales in any given month?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID FROM (SELECT employees.EmployeeID, YEAR(orders.OrderDate) AS Year, MONTH(orders.OrderDate) AS Month, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS MonthlySales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID, Year, Month) AS monthly_sales GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID HAVING MAX(monthly_sales.MonthlySales) > 2 * AVG(monthly_sales.MonthlySales);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average unit price of products by order?
SELECT o.OrderID, AVG(od.UnitPrice) AS AvgUnitPrice FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY o.OrderID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products have stock levels below their reorder level?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the average shipping cost per order compare between different regions?
SELECT customers.Region, AVG(orders.Freight) AS average_shipping_cost FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.Region
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the performance of product categories by sales.

SELECT c.CategoryID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS Performance FROM [Order Details] JOIN products p ON [Order Details].ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID GROUP BY c.CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the minimum, maximum, and average freight cost of shipped orders?
SELECT MIN(Freight) AS MinFreight, MAX(Freight) AS MaxFreight, AVG(Freight) AS AvgFreight FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier has the highest average product price?

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(products.UnitPrice) AS AvgPrice FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName ORDER BY AvgPrice DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the Inventory Turnover Ratio for the last quarter.

SELECT SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE od.OrderID IN (SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH));
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the on-time delivery rate compare across different shipping companies?
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN OrderID END) / COUNT(OrderID) * 100 AS OnTimeRate FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of units sold per unit price bracket?
SELECT FLOOR(UnitPrice) AS PriceBracket, SUM(od.Quantity) FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY FLOOR(UnitPrice);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all orders for the top customer by sales revenue.

SELECT orders.* FROM orders JOIN (SELECT orders.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.CustomerID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1) AS top_customer ON orders.CustomerID = top_customer.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many distinct customers have ordered products from each supplier?

SELECT products.SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) AS DistinctCustomers FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY products.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer placed the highest number of orders in March 2023?
SELECT o.CustomerID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders o WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY o.CustomerID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which countries have the highest number of orders shipped?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY OrderCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the most frequently ordered product?
SELECT o.ProductID, SUM(o.Quantity) AS TotalOrders FROM [Order Details] o GROUP BY o.ProductID ORDER BY TotalOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which month had the highest average shipping cost?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(Freight) AS AvgShippingCost FROM orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY AvgShippingCost DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all products along with their category and supplier names.

SELECT products.ProductName, categories.CategoryName, suppliers.SupplierName FROM products JOIN categories ON products.CategoryID = categories.CategoryID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find suppliers whose products have never been ordered.

SELECT SupplierID FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID LEFT JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID WHERE [Order Details].ProductID IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the products with zero stock but have units on order.
SELECT ProductID FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock = 0 AND UnitsOnOrder > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the average number of products per order.
SELECT AVG(od.Quantity) AS AverageProductsPerOrder FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average inventory turnover rate per category for the past six months?

SELECT CategoryID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / NULLIF(AVG(products.UnitsInStock), 0) AS AvgInventoryTurnover FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-03-01' AND '2023-08-31' GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed and shipped on the same day?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate = ShippedDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the top 5 products by quantity sold last month.

SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY od.ProductID ORDER BY TotalQuantity DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What was the average order value in the last quarter?

SELECT SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT orders.OrderID) AS AverageOrderValue FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE QUARTER(orders.OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURRENT_DATE) - 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 5 selling products.
SELECT p.ProductID FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID ORDER BY SUM(od.Quantity) DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the overall on-time delivery rate?
SELECT 100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) / COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue generated for each product?
SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS Total_Sales FROM [Order Details] od GROUP BY od.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders have been placed by customers in each city?
SELECT customers.City, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.City;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify employees who have processed orders with zero discounts.

SELECT DISTINCT employees.EmployeeID, employees.FirstName, employees.LastName FROM employees LEFT JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID LEFT JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE [Order Details].Discount = 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the ratio of shipped orders to unshipped orders?
SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN ShippedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN ShippedDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 2) AS ShippedToUnshippedRatio FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of each product sold?
SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the total revenue compare between different suppliers?

SELECT s.SupplierID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN suppliers s ON p.SupplierID = s.SupplierID GROUP BY s.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the inventory turnover ratio vary by month?

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(od.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, (SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / NULLIF(AVG(p.UnitsInStock),0)) AS TurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(od.OrderDate, '%Y-%m');
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost per order in the last month?
SELECT AVG(Freight) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total discount amount for each product.
SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does product performance vary across months?
SELECT p.ProductID, MONTH(od.OrderDate) AS Month, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID, MONTH(od.OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most ordered product in terms of quantity?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalOrderedQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalOrderedQuantity DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customers have generated the highest lifetime value?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS lifetime_value FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity ordered for each product categorized as ‘Electronics’?

SELECT p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE p.CategoryID = (SELECT CategoryID FROM categories WHERE CategoryName = 'Electronics') GROUP BY p.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time for domestic vs. international shipments?
SELECT CASE WHEN ShipCountry = 'USA' THEN 'Domestic' ELSE 'International' END AS ShipmentType, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY ShipmentType;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average number of days between the order date and the required date in 2023?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(RequiredDate, OrderDate)) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were shipped within 5 days of the order date?
SELECT COUNT(orders.OrderID) FROM orders WHERE DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate) <= 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all products that need to be reordered.
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average salary for employees per region.
SELECT e.Region, AVG(e.Salary) AS AvgSalary FROM employees e GROUP BY e.Region
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many customers are there from each country?
SELECT Country, COUNT(CustomerID) AS NumberOfCustomers FROM customers GROUP BY Country;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity ordered for each product across all orders?

Find the average discount applied to orders by each supplier.
SELECT p.SupplierID, AVG(od.Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost per sales territory?
SELECT o.ShipRegion, AVG(o.Freight) AS AvgFreight FROM orders o GROUP BY o.ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List products with a reorder level below their units in stock.
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock > ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the region with the highest sales revenue.

SELECT ShipRegion, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify discrepancies between required and shipped dates in orders and investigate the role of suppliers in delays.

SELECT orders.OrderID, DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.RequiredDate) AS DelayDays, suppliers.CompanyName FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID WHERE DATEDIFF(orders.ShipDate, orders.RequiredDate) > 0
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the difference in sales between employees in different regions?

SELECT e.Region, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees e LEFT JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID LEFT JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.Region
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which country has the highest on-time delivery rate?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN OrderID END) / COUNT(OrderID) * 100 AS OnTimeRate FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY OnTimeRate DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the orders that were shipped after the required date.
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied per order?
SELECT AVG(Discount) AS AverageDiscount FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have been ordered with a discount?
SELECT DISTINCT products.ProductName FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID WHERE [Order Details].Discount > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated from each product?
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee had the largest average order size in terms of quantity?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].Quantity) AS AvgOrderSize FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY AvgOrderSize DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total discount applied to each order.
SELECT o.OrderID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * od.Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY o.OrderID;

What are the current stock levels for each product?
SELECT ProductName, UnitsInStock FROM products;

List customers who have never placed an order.
SELECT c.CustomerID FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID WHERE o.OrderID IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of each product ordered by different customers?

SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How do order volumes differ by day of the week?
SELECT DAYOFWEEK(OrderDate) AS DayOfWeek, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderVolume FROM orders GROUP BY DayOfWeek ORDER BY OrderVolume DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee generated the highest sales last month?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND MONTH(orders.OrderDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify employees whose sales grew by more than 10% over the last year.

SELECT e.EmployeeID FROM (SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales, LAG(SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount))) OVER (PARTITION BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY o.OrderDate) AS PreviousSales FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, o.OrderDate) AS sales WHERE (TotalSales - PreviousSales) / PreviousSales > 0.1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the sales growth by employee for each month compared to the previous month?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, MONTH(orders.OrderDate) AS OrderMonth, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID, MONTH(orders.OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top three categories with the highest sales?

SELECT CategoryID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Retrieve the total sales for orders with discounts applied.
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] od WHERE od.Discount > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the on-time delivery rate for orders in the first half of 2022?
SELECT (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE o.ShippedDate <= o.RequiredDate) * 1.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM orders o WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find out which employees have the highest average order value.

SELECT orders.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AvgOrderValue FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID ORDER BY AvgOrderValue DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify orders where the shipped date is later than the required date.
SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer has the highest discount applied on average?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, AVG([Order Details].Discount) AS AverageDiscount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID ORDER BY AverageDiscount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How much freight cost is incurred per employee's orders?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(o.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;

Find the total units sold for each product.
SELECT ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalUnitsSold FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID;

What is the monthly product performance?
SELECT p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS Performance FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average quantity ordered per unit for each product?
SELECT ProductID, AVG(Quantity) AS AvgQuantityPerUnit FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which region has the highest average freight cost?
SELECT ShipRegion, AVG(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY AVG(Freight) DESC LIMIT 1;

Find the total revenue generated by each supplier's products.
SELECT p.SupplierID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS Revenue FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average price of products within each category?
SELECT CategoryID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AvgPrice FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product categories are most frequently ordered?
SELECT products.CategoryID, COUNT(*) AS OrderFrequency FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY products.CategoryID ORDER BY OrderFrequency DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has the highest number of overdue shipments?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, COUNT(*) AS OverdueShipments FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE ShippedDate IS NOT NULL AND ShippedDate > RequiredDate GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY OverdueShipments DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders shipped after the required date?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) AS LateOrders FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?

SELECT SUM(Freight) AS Total_Freight FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'Germany';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have the highest total sales revenue?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the average inventory turnover ratio for each month.

SELECT DATEPART(month, OrderDate) AS Month, SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS AvgTurnover FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY DATEPART(month, OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given per order?
SELECT AVG(Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM [Order Details];

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM OrderDate) AS Month, COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM orders GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM OrderDate);

What is the total sales revenue generated in December 2022?
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-12-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT products.ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductID;

SELECT customers.CustomerID, COUNT(DISTINCT [Order Details].ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID;

Identify products with stock below their reorder level.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;

What is the difference in total sales between the top two employees?

SELECT A.EmployeeID, (A.TotalSales - B.TotalSales) AS SalesDifference FROM (SELECT EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 2) AS A CROSS JOIN (SELECT EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) AS B;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the Customer Lifetime Value for each customer?

SELECT c.CustomerID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS CLV FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY c.CustomerID;
