Identify products with declining sales performance over the past year.

SELECT products.ProductID, products.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS sales_quantity FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY products.ProductID HAVING SUM([Order Details].Quantity) < (SELECT SUM(od.Quantity) FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE od.ProductID = products.ProductID AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) - 2)
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgShippingTime FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE ShippedDate IS NOT NULL GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID;

SELECT AVG(Discount) FROM [Order Details] WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT p.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgLeadTime FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN orders o ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;

Determine the supplier with the longest average delivery time.

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS AvgDeliveryTime FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID ORDER BY AvgDeliveryTime DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT SupplierID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AvgPrice FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID;

Which supplier has the fastest delivery time?

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_delivery_time FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName ORDER BY avg_delivery_time

SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, AVG([Order Details].Discount) AS AverageDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID ORDER BY AverageDiscount DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC;

What is the average shipping cost by country?
SELECT ShipCountry, AVG(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;

What is the total freight cost for orders handled by each employee?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(o.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost per order?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AverageFreight FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the retention rate for customers over the last year?

SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN orders.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND CURDATE() THEN orders.CustomerID END) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN orders.OrderDate < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) THEN orders.CustomerID END), 0)) * 100 AS RetentionRate FROM orders;

What is the sales revenue for each supplier?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS SalesRevenue FROM [Order Details] JOIN products p ON [Order Details].ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON p.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the top performing products based on sales.
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS SalesVolume FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY SalesVolume DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify suppliers with the most products in the inventory.
SELECT SupplierID, COUNT(ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY ProductCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the top 3 products by revenue.

SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS ProductRevenue FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID ORDER BY ProductRevenue DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average inventory level per product?
SELECT AVG(UnitsInStock) FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the product with the highest inventory turnover ratio this month.

Corrected SQL: SELECT products.ProductID, (SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(products.UnitsInStock)) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID WHERE MONTH('order_date' column) = MONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) GROUP BY products.ProductID ORDER BY InventoryTurnoverRatio DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which day of the week had the most orders placed in March 2023?
SELECT DAYOFWEEK(o.OrderDate) AS Day, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders o WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY Day ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;

What is the total freight cost for each country in the last quarter?

SELECT o.ShipCountry, SUM(o.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders o WHERE QUARTER(o.OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) GROUP BY o.ShipCountry;

Which orders have the highest total discount value?
SELECT OrderID, SUM(Discount * Quantity * UnitPrice) AS TotalDiscountValue FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY OrderID ORDER BY TotalDiscountValue DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of orders were shipped via each method?
SELECT ShipVia, (COUNT(OrderID) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders)) AS Percentage FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;

Find the top five cities with the highest number of orders.
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 5;

What is the average number of days between order date and shipped date for each employee?
SELECT EmployeeID, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgDays FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID;

How many orders are still pending for each employee?
SELECT employees.EmployeeID, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS PendingOrders FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify employees who have processed more than 100 orders this year.

SELECT employees.EmployeeID FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID HAVING COUNT(orders.OrderID) > 100;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the difference in average order fulfillment time between 'ShipVia' 1 and 2?
SELECT ABS(AVG(CASE WHEN ShipVia = 1 THEN DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate) END) - AVG(CASE WHEN ShipVia = 2 THEN DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate) END)) AS AvgFulfillmentDifference FROM orders;

What is the highest freight cost recorded this year?
SELECT MAX(Freight) FROM orders WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 5 products with the highest total sales revenue.
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify suppliers whose products have been discontinued.
SELECT SupplierID, CompanyName FROM suppliers WHERE SupplierID IN (SELECT SupplierID FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the top 5 orders with the highest freight cost.
SELECT OrderID, Freight FROM orders ORDER BY Freight DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost per order for each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(Freight) AS AvgShippingCost FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost for each shipping method used?
SELECT ShipVia, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost per order each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(Freight) AS AvgShippingCost FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does employee age correlate with sales performance?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, employees.FirstName, employees.LastName, YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(employees.BirthDate) AS age, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products have been ordered more than 100 times and what are their respective supplier names?

SELECT products.ProductName, suppliers.CompanyName FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY products.ProductName, suppliers.CompanyName HAVING SUM([Order Details].Quantity) > 100
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier provides the highest number of different products?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT products.ProductID) AS Number_of_Products FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID ORDER BY Number_of_Products DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the total units in stock for each product category?
SELECT products.CategoryID, SUM(products.UnitsInStock) AS Total_Units_In_Stock FROM products GROUP BY products.CategoryID;

You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the total sales for each product in the last month?

SELECT p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSales FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE od.OrderID IN (SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) GROUP BY p.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate monthly product performance.
SELECT ProductID, MONTH(od.OrderDate) AS Month, SUM(od.Quantity) AS Performance FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID, MONTH(od.OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average number of products per order?
SELECT AVG(Quantity) FROM (SELECT OrderID, SUM(Quantity) AS Quantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY OrderID) AS OrderQuantities;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the top three employees with the highest sales in the last quarter.

SELECT EmployeeID, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 3
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the supplier with the most units on order.
SELECT s.CompanyName FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID ORDER BY p.UnitsOnOrder DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How much freight cost is associated with each employee's orders?
SELECT orders.EmployeeID, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied to each product?
SELECT od.ProductID, AVG(od.Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM [Order Details] od GROUP BY od.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost for each shipping method?
SELECT ShipVia, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average reorder level of all products supplied by each supplier?
SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(products.ReorderLevel) AS average_reorder_level FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many unique shipping companies are used in the orders?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ShipVia) AS UniqueShippingCompanies FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the top 3 regions with the highest total order count.
SELECT ShipRegion, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has processed the most orders in 2022?
SELECT orders.EmployeeID, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2022 GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given on products across all orders?
SELECT AVG(Discount) FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which country has the highest number of customers?
SELECT Country, COUNT(CustomerID) AS NumberOfCustomers FROM customers GROUP BY Country ORDER BY NumberOfCustomers DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers have the highest average unit price for their products?
SELECT SupplierID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AvgUnitPrice FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY AvgUnitPrice DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find out the monthly sales trend for each product.
SELECT ProductID, DATEPART(month, OrderDate) AS Month, SUM(Quantity) AS MonthlySales FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID, DATEPART(month, OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the freight cost vary by employee?
SELECT EmployeeID, AVG(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the products that need to be reordered due to low stock levels.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many discontinued products are there from each supplier?
SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, COUNT(*) AS DiscontinuedProducts FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID WHERE Discontinued = 1 GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have a salary higher than the average of all employees?
SELECT employees.EmployeeID, employees.Salary FROM employees WHERE employees.Salary > (SELECT AVG(Salary) FROM employees);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the customer who made the earliest purchase.
SELECT CustomerID, MIN(OrderDate) AS FirstPurchaseDate FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY FirstPurchaseDate LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the inventory turnover ratio for the last month?

SELECT SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS InventoryTurnover FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM od.OrderDate) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month');
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which region receives the highest number of shipments?
SELECT ShipRegion, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all customers who have never placed an order?
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName FROM customers WHERE CustomerID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT CustomerID FROM orders);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have a stock level below their reorder level?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Analyze the relationship between the total sales and employee salary across different territories.

SELECT territories.TerritoryDescription, employees.Salary, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS territory_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID JOIN employeeTerritories ON employees.EmployeeID = employeeTerritories.EmployeeID JOIN territories ON employeeTerritories.TerritoryID = territories.TerritoryID GROUP BY territories.TerritoryDescription, employees.Salary
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customers have received the most discounts on their orders?
SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY TotalDiscount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the sales trends for each product over the last year?

SELECT MONTH(orders.OrderDate) AS month, products.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS total_quantity FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE orders.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY month, products.ProductName ORDER BY month
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 products by revenue?

SELECT products.ProductName, SUM(([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity) * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS Revenue FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductName ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders have a required date but are not yet shipped?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) AS PendingOrders FROM orders WHERE RequiredDate IS NOT NULL AND ShippedDate IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify areas with the longest order fulfillment times.
SELECT ShipRegion, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY AvgFulfillmentTime DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total sales for each month, grouping by product.

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(orders.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS MonthYear, products.ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN products ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY MonthYear, products.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which region has the highest employee performance in terms of sales?

SELECT employees.Region, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.Region ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier provides the most expensive product?
SELECT p.ProductName, p.UnitPrice FROM products p ORDER BY p.UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average hiring age of employees across different titles?
SELECT employees.Title, AVG(YEAR(HireDate) - YEAR(BirthDate)) AS AvgHiringAge FROM employees GROUP BY employees.Title;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average unit price for products within each category?
SELECT CategoryID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AvgUnitPrice FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has processed the highest number of orders?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the month with the highest average order value in 2022.

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS AvgOrderValue FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY Month ORDER BY AvgOrderValue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which orders had a freight cost greater than $100?
SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE Freight > 100;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate inventory turnover ratio for products categorized as electronics.

SELECT p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS TurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID WHERE p.CategoryID = (SELECT CategoryID FROM categories WHERE Description = 'electronics') GROUP BY p.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have exceeded their sales targets in the previous quarter?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID WHERE QUARTER(orders.OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURDATE()) - 1 AND YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID HAVING total_sales > 500000
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the on-time delivery rate for each shipping company?

SELECT shippers.CompanyName, SUM(CASE WHEN orders.ShippedDate <= orders.RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS on_time_rate FROM orders JOIN shippers ON orders.ShipVia = shippers.ShipperID GROUP BY shippers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has the highest concentration of employees?
SELECT City, COUNT(EmployeeID) AS EmployeeCount FROM employees GROUP BY City ORDER BY EmployeeCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated from each customer?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the monthly inventory turnover for the last year.

SELECT MONTH([Order Details].OrderDate) AS Month, (SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(products.UnitsInStock)) AS Turnover FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID WHERE YEAR([Order Details].OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) - 1 GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total discount given on orders per customer?

SELECT c.CustomerID, SUM(od.Discount * od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity) AS TotalDiscount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY c.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which day of the week has the most shipments?
SELECT DAYOFWEEK(ShippedDate) AS WeekDay, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders GROUP BY WeekDay ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total value of products currently on order by supplier?
SELECT s.CompanyName, SUM(p.UnitsOnOrder * p.UnitPrice) AS TotalValueOnOrder FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID GROUP BY s.CompanyName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which region has the highest number of employees?
SELECT Region, COUNT(EmployeeID) AS EmployeeCount FROM employees GROUP BY Region ORDER BY EmployeeCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied to orders of non-discontinued products?
SELECT AVG([Order Details].Discount) FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID WHERE products.Discontinued = 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the employees who have never handled an order.
SELECT e.* FROM employees e LEFT JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID WHERE o.OrderID IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the general trend of inventory levels over the past year?
SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS OrderMonth, SUM(UnitsInStock) AS InventoryLevel FROM products JOIN orders ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY MONTH(OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many employees were hired in each year?
SELECT YEAR(HireDate) AS Year, COUNT(EmployeeID) AS Hires FROM employees GROUP BY YEAR(HireDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 products by sales quantity?
SELECT TOP 5 p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSalesQuantity FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID ORDER BY TotalSalesQuantity DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Compare the inventory turnover ratios of different categories.
SELECT p.CategoryID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS TurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find out which products are sold the most by each employee.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, od.ProductID, COUNT(od.ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, od.ProductID ORDER BY ProductCount DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the employee whose orders have the highest average discount.

SELECT e.EmployeeID FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID HAVING AVG(od.Discount) = (SELECT MAX(AVG(od.Discount)) FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products were ordered more than 100 times each in March 2023?
SELECT od.ProductID FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY od.ProductID HAVING SUM(od.Quantity) > 100;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List employees with a salary above the average salary.
SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName FROM employees e WHERE e.Salary > (SELECT AVG(Salary) FROM employees);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average order size (in terms of quantity) for each employee.
SELECT e.EmployeeID, AVG(od.Quantity) AS AvgQuantity FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products are sold at a discount more than 20% of the time?
SELECT ProductID FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN Discount > 0.2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) > 0.2;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the suppliers who provide products that have been discontinued.
SELECT SupplierID FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1 GROUP BY SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all products that need to be reordered.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost for orders shipped to the USA?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AvgShippingCost FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'USA';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the total sales for each product category.

SELECT CategoryID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 5 most reliable suppliers by lead time and average order size.

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_lead_time, AVG([Order Details].Quantity) AS avg_order_size FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName ORDER BY avg_lead_time ASC, avg_order_size DESC LIMIT 5
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the proportion of products with reorder levels higher than 50.
SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN ReorderLevel > 50 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 AS HighReorderLevelPercentage FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue generated in the last month?
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average fulfillment time for orders shipped this month?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders o WHERE MONTH(o.ShippedDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(o.ShippedDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total sales for each month in 2023.

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS OrderMonth, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY OrderMonth;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost for each shipping country?
SELECT ShipCountry, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed by each customer last month?

SELECT o.CustomerID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrdersCount FROM orders o WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY o.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which regions have the highest number of delayed shipments?
SELECT ShipRegion, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate GROUP BY ShipRegion ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order value for each month of the current year?

SELECT MONTH(orders.OrderDate) AS Month, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AverageOrderValue FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY MONTH(orders.OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the total sales by employees grouped by country?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.Country, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, e.Country;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List products that are currently out of stock.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock = 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the total quantity ordered for each supplier.

SELECT suppliers.SupplierName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping company was used the most in the last quarter?
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total revenue generated by employees in each country.

SELECT employees.Country, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.Country, employees.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products have been discontinued by each supplier?
SELECT s.CompanyName, COUNT(p.ProductID) AS Discontinued_Products FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID WHERE p.Discontinued = 1 GROUP BY s.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find products with the highest margin (unit price minus average discount).
SELECT p.ProductID, (p.UnitPrice - AVG(o.Discount * o.UnitPrice)) AS Margin FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] o ON p.ProductID = o.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID ORDER BY Margin DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order value per employee?

SELECT orders.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AverageOrderValue FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the effect of discounts on total sales by each employee.

SELECT orders.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].Discount) AS DiscountImpact FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the employees who have processed orders with the highest discounts.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, MAX(od.Discount) AS MaxDiscount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY MaxDiscount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the average sales per product in the last year.

SELECT ProductID, AVG([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS AvgSales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the top 5 cities by number of different customers.
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS CustomerCount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the top 5 products with the highest number of units on order.
SELECT ProductName FROM products ORDER BY UnitsOnOrder DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find products with the highest price-to-stock ratio.
SELECT p.ProductID, (p.UnitPrice / NULLIF(p.UnitsInStock, 0)) AS PriceToStockRatio FROM products p ORDER BY PriceToStockRatio DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were not fulfilled on time in March 2023?
SELECT COUNT(o.OrderID) FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate > o.RequiredDate AND MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List customers with multiple orders in the same month.
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount, DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS OrderMonth FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID, OrderMonth HAVING OrderCount > 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify trends in monthly product performance.

SELECT MONTH(o.OrderDate) AS Month, p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY Month, p.ProductID ORDER BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost incurred by each shipping method?
SELECT ShipVia, SUM(Freight) as TotalFreight FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the discount value for each order detail?
SELECT OrderID, ProductID, (UnitPrice * Quantity * Discount) AS DiscountValue FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated by each category of products?

SELECT c.CategoryID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID GROUP BY c.CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has the highest number of orders delivered?
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products are discontinued?
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the top-revenue-generating product in each category?

SELECT categories.CategoryName, products.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_revenue FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN categories ON products.CategoryID = categories.CategoryID GROUP BY categories.CategoryName, products.ProductName ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of orders are delivered on or before the required date for each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed with a discount greater than 10% this year?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT orders.OrderID) AS DiscountedOrders FROM orders JOIN `Order Details` ON orders.OrderID = `Order Details`.OrderID WHERE Discount > 0.1 AND YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier provides the most diverse range of products?
SELECT SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) AS ProductVariety FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY ProductVariety DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have stock levels below their reorder points?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue generated in January 2022?
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find products that need reordering as per their reorder levels.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product ID has the highest sales revenue in March 2023?

SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY od.ProductID ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product has the highest total sales value?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customers have a Customer Lifetime Value above a certain threshold?

SELECT customers.CustomerID FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID HAVING SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) > 10000;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were processed by employees hired in the last two years?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE employees.HireDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products need to be reordered based on their reorder levels?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were fulfilled on the same day they were placed?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) AS SameDayFulfillment FROM orders WHERE DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate) = 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average number of days between order date and required date?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(RequiredDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgDaysRequired FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which month had the highest number of orders?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY TotalOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total discount given by each employee in their processed orders?

SELECT orders.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which category of products generates the most revenue?

SELECT categories.CategoryName, SUM(([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity) * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS Revenue FROM categories JOIN products ON categories.CategoryID = products.CategoryID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY categories.CategoryName ORDER BY Revenue DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were handled by each employee this month?

SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM OrderDate) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURDATE()) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM OrderDate) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURDATE()) GROUP BY EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the month-over-month trend in shipping costs?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the monthly total sales per product category.

SELECT c.CategoryName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY c.CategoryName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products require reorder based on current inventory levels?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel AND Discontinued = 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost for orders over $1000?
SELECT SUM(Freight) FROM orders WHERE Freight > 1000;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees are reporting to a manager who has the lowest sales?

SELECT e.EmployeeID FROM employees e WHERE e.ReportsTo = (SELECT ReportsTo FROM employees em JOIN (SELECT ReportsTo, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS ManagerSales FROM employees em JOIN orders o ON em.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY ReportsTo ORDER BY ManagerSales ASC LIMIT 1) sub);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Rank employees based on their total number of orders processed.
SELECT orders.EmployeeID, COUNT(*) AS TotalOrders FROM orders GROUP BY orders.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalOrders DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the names of all products supplied by each supplier?
SELECT SupplierID, ProductName FROM products ORDER BY SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average customer lifetime value segmented by country?

SELECT customers.Country, AVG(lifetime_value) AS average_lifetime_value FROM (SELECT customers.CustomerID, customers.Country, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS lifetime_value FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID, customers.Country) sub_query GROUP BY customers.Country
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier has the slowest average delivery time?

SELECT p.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgDeliveryTime FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.SupplierID = o.SupplierID GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY AvgDeliveryTime DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the correlation between supplier lead time and their product performance?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS lead_time, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS product_performance FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales for orders shipped within their required date?
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS SalesForOnTimeOrders FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.ShippedDate <= o.RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the top 5 products by sales quantity.
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSalesQuantity FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalSalesQuantity DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many unique customers placed orders in the last month?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM orders WHERE MONTH(OrderDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) - 1 AND YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the most frequently ordered product.
SELECT ProductID, COUNT(ProductID) AS Order_Count FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY Order_Count DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify suppliers located in Germany.
SELECT CompanyName FROM suppliers WHERE Country = 'Germany';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does product inventory turnover differ between the top Suppliers?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / NULLIF(AVG(products.UnitsInStock), 0) AS inventory_turnover FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID ORDER BY inventory_turnover DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the order fulfillment time for each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(orders.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS FulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product was ordered the most?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalQuantity DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the total number of unique products sold per employee.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS UniqueProductsSold FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify orders that have not yet been shipped.
SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total value of orders not yet shipped per employee?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS UnshippedOrderValue FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NULL GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify any customers with repeat purchases of the same product.

SELECT c.CustomerID, od.ProductID, COUNT(*) FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY c.CustomerID, od.ProductID HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of products shipped in March 2023?
SELECT SUM(od.Quantity) FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total order value for each product considering discounts.
SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS OrderValue FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the Customer Retention Rate for the past year.

SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT o.CustomerID FILTER (WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN DATEADD(year, -1, CURRENT_DATE) AND CURRENT_DATE))::decimal / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT o.CustomerID FILTER (WHERE o.OrderDate < DATEADD(year, -1, CURRENT_DATE))), 0)) AS RetentionRate FROM orders o;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order value processed by employees in each region?

SELECT employees.Region, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AverageOrderValue FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.Region;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Evaluate the average freight cost per order by region, and how it affects profitability.

SELECT r.RegionDescription, AVG(o.Freight) AS AvgFreight, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS Profitability FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID JOIN region r ON c.Region = r.RegionID GROUP BY r.RegionDescription
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most ordered product by quantity?
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalOrdered FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalOrdered DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 5 customers by total sales revenue last quarter.

SELECT o.CustomerID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE QUARTER(o.OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) GROUP BY o.CustomerID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the order fulfillment time for February 2023?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS FulfillmentTime FROM orders o WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-02-01' AND '2023-02-28';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the most common shipping method used.
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(OrderID) AS Count FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY Count DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average order fulfillment time grouped by shipping method for 2023.
SELECT ShipVia, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many days on average do orders to 'Germany' exceed the required date?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, RequiredDate)) AS AvgExceedDays FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'Germany' AND ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the maximum freight cost for a single order in the last year?
SELECT MAX(Freight) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the relationship between employee sales and salary?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS sales, employees.Salary FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which month had the highest number of orders?
SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders GROUP BY MONTH(OrderDate) ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the employee with the earliest hire date who is still actively making sales.
SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, e.HireDate FROM employees e WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID) ORDER BY e.HireDate LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of total sales does each employee contribute to?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / (SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID) * 100 AS SalesPercentage FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have a higher unit price compared to others in their category?
SELECT p.ProductName FROM products p WHERE p.UnitPrice > (SELECT AVG(UnitPrice) FROM products WHERE CategoryID = p.CategoryID);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue for each customer?

SELECT c.CustomerID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY c.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average number of days between order and shipping date for each shipping method?
SELECT ShipVia, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgDaysToShip FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How has the average fulfillment time changed over the past six months?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month DESC LIMIT 6;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the average unit price of all products supplied by each supplier.
SELECT SupplierID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AvgUnitPrice FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated by each product category?
SELECT CategoryID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity) as TotalRevenue FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify top three products contributing to revenue.
SELECT ProductID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS Revenue FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost for each shipping method?
SELECT ShipVia, AVG(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of products sold per product?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalQuantity DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have the longest average order fulfillment time in their territories?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, territories.TerritoryDescription, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_fulfillment_time FROM orders JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID JOIN employeeTerritories ON employees.EmployeeID = employeeTerritories.EmployeeID JOIN territories ON employeeTerritories.TerritoryID = territories.TerritoryID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID, territories.TerritoryDescription
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most expensive product supplied by each supplier?
SELECT SupplierID, ProductName, MAX(UnitPrice) FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID HAVING UnitPrice = MAX(UnitPrice);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which category of products has the most units on order?
SELECT p.CategoryID, SUM(p.UnitsOnOrder) FROM products p GROUP BY p.CategoryID ORDER BY SUM(p.UnitsOnOrder) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier offers the highest number of different products?
SELECT SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY ProductCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which cities have the highest number of orders shipped?
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given on products by each supplier?

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG([Order Details].Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the correlation between freight cost and order value?
SELECT CORR(o.Freight, od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS Correlation FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the top 3 employees with the highest total freight cost handling.

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM(orders.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalFreight DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the Inventory Turnover Ratio for the past month.

SELECT SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(products.UnitsInStock) AS InventoryTurnover FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID WHERE MONTH([Order Details].OrderDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost for shipped orders by country?
SELECT o.ShipCountry, AVG(o.Freight) AS AvgFreight FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL GROUP BY o.ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were shipped on-time in Q1 2023?
SELECT COUNT(o.OrderID) FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate <= o.RequiredDate AND o.ShippedDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products were ordered by customers in urban areas but not in rural areas, based on the shipping city?

SELECT DISTINCT p.ProductName FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE o.ShipCity LIKE 'Urban%' AND p.ProductID NOT IN (SELECT p2.ProductID FROM products p2 JOIN [Order Details] od2 ON p2.ProductID = od2.ProductID JOIN orders o2 ON od2.OrderID = o2.OrderID WHERE o2.ShipCity LIKE 'Rural%')
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer placed the most orders?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping method is used most frequently?
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(OrderID) AS UsageCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY UsageCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What was the average freight cost for orders requiring shipment to 'London' in 2023?
SELECT AVG(Freight) FROM orders WHERE ShipCity = 'London' AND OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the supplier with the highest total sales revenue.

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS Supplier_Total_Sales FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID ORDER BY Supplier_Total_Sales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which category has the most products close to the reorder level?
SELECT CategoryID, COUNT(*) AS CloseToReorder FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY CloseToReorder DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the products with the highest inventory turnover ratio.

SELECT p.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS InventoryTurnover FROM [Order Details] JOIN products p ON [Order Details].ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY InventoryTurnover DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order value for January 2023?

SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS AvgOrderValue FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have generated the highest sales in their respective regions?

SELECT regions.RegionDescription, employees.LastName, employees.FirstName, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID JOIN employeeTerritories ON employees.EmployeeID = employeeTerritories.EmployeeID JOIN territories ON employeeTerritories.TerritoryID = territories.TerritoryID JOIN regions ON territories.RegionID = regions.RegionID GROUP BY regions.RegionDescription, employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY total_sales DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How often do shipments go to regions without postal codes?
SELECT ShipRegion, COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE ShipPostalCode IS NULL GROUP BY ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the difference in total sales between two specific months?

SELECT ABS(SUM(case when MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 1 THEN od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount) ELSE 0 END) - SUM(case when MONTH(o.OrderDate) = 2 THEN od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount) ELSE 0 END)) AS Difference FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were shipped on time last month?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate <= RequiredDate AND OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the names of discontinued products?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 3 least performing products by sales volume?
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSales FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalSales ASC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify which orders contain discontinued products.
SELECT DISTINCT OrderID FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID WHERE products.Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which orders received the highest discount on products?
SELECT OrderID, MAX(Discount) AS MaxDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY OrderID ORDER BY MaxDiscount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many days does it take to fulfill an order on average?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee handled the most orders last quarter?

SELECT o.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders o WHERE QUARTER(o.OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 QUARTER) GROUP BY o.EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the unit price range for products.
SELECT MIN(UnitPrice) AS MinPrice, MAX(UnitPrice) AS MaxPrice FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the performance of products by calculating their sales quantity and categorize them by region.

SELECT products.ProductID, region.RegionDescription, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS product_performance FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID JOIN region ON customers.Region = region.RegionID GROUP BY products.ProductID, region.RegionDescription
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List customers who have not placed any orders.
SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE CustomerID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT CustomerID FROM orders);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which orders were shipped later than their required date?
SELECT o.OrderID FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate > o.RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue for each product?
SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID, p.ProductName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How is the average order value distributed across different regions?

SELECT regions.RegionDescription, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT orders.OrderID) AS avg_order_value FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID JOIN region AS regions ON customers.Region = regions.RegionID GROUP BY regions.RegionDescription
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all the products supplied by a particular supplier, including their stock levels.
SELECT p.ProductName, p.UnitsInStock FROM products p WHERE p.SupplierID = ?;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product had the highest sales quantity last month?

SELECT p.ProductName FROM [Order Details] JOIN products p ON [Order Details].ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN orders o ON [Order Details].OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate >= '2023-09-01' AND o.OrderDate < '2023-10-01' GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY SUM([Order Details].Quantity) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were shipped within the same month they were placed?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) AS SameMonthOrders FROM orders WHERE MONTH(OrderDate) = MONTH(ShippedDate) AND YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(ShippedDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 best-selling products?
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSold FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalSold DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How much discount in total has been applied by each employee?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, SUM(od.Discount * od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalDiscount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average unit price of products within each category?
SELECT CategoryID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AveragePrice FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify products that have never been ordered.
SELECT ProductName FROM products p LEFT JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE od.ProductID IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which month had the highest number of delayed shipments?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ShippedDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS DelayedShipments FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate GROUP BY Month ORDER BY DelayedShipments DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the variance in shipping costs among different shipping companies?
SELECT shippers.CompanyName, STDDEV(orders.Freight) AS shipping_cost_variance FROM orders JOIN shippers ON orders.ShipVia = shippers.ShipperID GROUP BY shippers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the total revenue generated in the current fiscal year.

SELECT SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping company has the highest on-time delivery rate?
