SELECT ShipVia, (COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) / COUNT(OrderID)) AS OnTimeRate FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY OnTimeRate DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the on-time delivery rate change with the order quantity?

SELECT [Order Details].Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN orders.ShippedDate <= orders.RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS on_time_rate FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY [Order Details].Quantity
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the on-time delivery rate differ between various suppliers?

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(CASE WHEN orders.ShippedDate <= orders.RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS on_time_rate FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which category of products has the lowest average unit price?
SELECT p.CategoryID, AVG(p.UnitPrice) AS Average_Unit_Price FROM products p GROUP BY p.CategoryID ORDER BY Average_Unit_Price ASC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer has the highest lifetime value?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS LifetimeValue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID ORDER BY LifetimeValue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders have not been shipped yet?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) AS UnshippedOrders FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the correlation between freight cost and order fulfillment time.
SELECT CORR(Freight, DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS Correlation FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many units are on order for each product?
SELECT ProductID, UnitsOnOrder FROM products WHERE UnitsOnOrder > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which cities have the highest number of suppliers?
SELECT City, COUNT(SupplierID) AS NumberOfSuppliers FROM suppliers GROUP BY City ORDER BY NumberOfSuppliers DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which region has the highest total sales?

SELECT Region, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID GROUP BY Region ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the orders with the highest freight cost in each country.
SELECT ShipCountry, OrderID, Freight FROM orders WHERE (ShipCountry, Freight) IN (SELECT ShipCountry, MAX(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost for orders shipped to France?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AvgShippingCostToFrance FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'France';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers are most frequently ordered from?

SELECT p.SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID GROUP BY p.SupplierID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost for each shipping company?
SELECT ShipVia, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Rank the products based on the total number of units ordered.

SELECT products.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalUnits FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductID ORDER BY TotalUnits DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the monthly total sales and average order value for each shipping country?

SELECT orders.ShipCountry, DATE_FORMAT(orders.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT orders.OrderID) AS avg_order_value FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY orders.ShipCountry, month
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How long does it take on average before orders are shipped post order date?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders shipped per month?
SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all employees in a particular region with their total sales ranking.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.Region, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE e.Region = 'SpecificRegion' GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, e.Region ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the products with orders that received a discount.
SELECT DISTINCT p.ProductName FROM [Order Details] JOIN products p ON [Order Details].ProductID = p.ProductID WHERE [Order Details].Discount > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has the highest sales in the last month?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the longest time taken to fulfill an order in 2023?
SELECT MAX(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 3 regions with the highest total sales in the last year and outline the employee distribution.

SELECT r.RegionDescription, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID JOIN region r ON customers.Region = r.RegionID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = (YEAR(CURDATE()) - 1) GROUP BY r.RegionDescription ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 3
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total discount given by each employee.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * od.Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify orders with a freight cost higher than the average.
SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE Freight > (SELECT AVG(Freight) FROM orders);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product has the highest number of units on order?
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsOnOrder = (SELECT MAX(UnitsOnOrder) FROM products);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost per country?
SELECT ShipCountry, SUM(Freight) FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 3 cities with the highest number of suppliers?
SELECT City, COUNT(SupplierID) AS SupplierCount FROM suppliers GROUP BY City ORDER BY SupplierCount DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find out the top 3 categories contributing to the highest revenue.

SELECT CategoryID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity) as TotalRevenue FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the average discount applied by an employee compare across different regions?

SELECT Region, EmployeeID, AVG(Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY Region, EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the correlation between hire date and sales performance?

SELECT EmployeeID, Correlation FROM (SELECT EmployeeID, CORR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, HireDate, CURDATE()), UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS Correlation FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY EmployeeID) AS CorrelationTable ORDER BY Correlation DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time for each month this year?
SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY MONTH(OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which supplier provides the highest number of different products?
SELECT SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY ProductCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the products that are currently discontinued.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the retention rate of customers between two dates?

SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FILTER (WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31')) / NULLIF((COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FILTER (WHERE orders.OrderDate < '2022-01-01')),0) * 100 AS RetentionRate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed in each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many products are discontinued?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DiscontinuedCount FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated per customer?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all orders that were shipped late.
SELECT OrderID, OrderDate, RequiredDate, ShippedDate FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the percentage increase or decrease in units ordered compared to last month?

SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-08-01' AND '2023-08-31' THEN Quantity ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-07-01' AND '2023-07-31' THEN Quantity ELSE 0 END)) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-07-01' AND '2023-07-31' THEN Quantity ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PercentageChange FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has received the most shipments?
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(*) AS Shipments FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY Shipments DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the on-time delivery rate compare across different regions?
SELECT ShipRegion, 100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) / COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine which category generated the most revenue last year.

SELECT CategoryID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS Revenue FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(GETDATE()) - 1 GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY Revenue DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which orders were delayed beyond their required date?
SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed but not yet shipped?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many discontinued products have we?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total revenue generated last month.

SELECT SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND CURDATE();
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the average freight cost compare between two specific shipping methods?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AvgCostForMethod1 FROM orders WHERE ShipVia = 1; SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AvgCostForMethod2 FROM orders WHERE ShipVia = 2;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify orders where the freight cost was higher than the order value.
SELECT OrderID, Freight FROM orders WHERE Freight > (SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) FROM `Order Details` WHERE OrderID = orders.OrderID);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed by each customer?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the maximum freight cost paid for any single order?
SELECT MAX(Freight) AS MaxFreightCost FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does the total sales compare across different territories?

SELECT territories.TerritoryDescription, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employeeTerritories ON orders.EmployeeID = employeeTerritories.EmployeeID JOIN territories ON employeeTerritories.TerritoryID = territories.TerritoryID GROUP BY territories.TerritoryDescription
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many distinct products were sold in Q1 2023?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average number of days between the order date and the required date for delayed shipments?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(RequiredDate, OrderDate)) AS AverageDelay FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the rate of increase in total sales compared to the previous quarter?

WITH previous_quarter AS (SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ((MONTH(CURDATE())-1) % 3 + 1) MONTH), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (MONTH(CURDATE())-1) % 3 MONTH), INTERVAL 1 DAY)), current_quarter AS (SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ((MONTH(CURDATE())-1) % 3 + 1) MONTH), INTERVAL 0 MONTH) AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (MONTH(CURDATE())-1) % 3 DAY)) SELECT ((current_quarter.TotalSales - previous_quarter.TotalSales) / previous_quarter.TotalSales) * 100 AS SalesGrowthRate FROM current_quarter, previous_quarter;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the monthly inventory turnover ratio for each category?

SELECT categories.CategoryName, MONTH(orders.OrderDate) AS month, SUM([Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) / AVG(products.UnitsInStock) AS turnover_ratio FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN categories ON products.CategoryID = categories.CategoryID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY categories.CategoryName, month
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time for orders shipped via different shipping companies?
SELECT shippers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_fulfillment_time FROM orders JOIN shippers ON orders.ShipVia = shippers.ShipperID GROUP BY shippers.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has the most suppliers located?
SELECT City, COUNT(SupplierID) AS SupplierCount FROM suppliers GROUP BY City ORDER BY SupplierCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the employee with the longest tenure in the company.
SELECT *, DATEDIFF(NOW(), HireDate) AS Tenure FROM employees ORDER BY Tenure DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the total sales quantities for each product in the last quarter?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-07-01' AND '2023-09-30' GROUP BY ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average lead time for each supplier in delivering their products?

SELECT p.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS Average_Lead_Time FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity ordered for each product?
SELECT p.ProductID, SUM(o.Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] o ON p.ProductID = o.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product has the highest unit price, and how many units are in stock for it?
SELECT ProductName, UnitPrice, UnitsInStock FROM products ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have sold more than 500 units in total?
SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS Total_Quantity FROM [Order Details] od GROUP BY od.ProductID HAVING Total_Quantity > 500;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed by each customer in March 2023?
SELECT orders.CustomerID, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders WHERE MONTH(orders.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY orders.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the products with the highest discrepancy between units in stock and units on order.
SELECT ProductID, (UnitsInStock - UnitsOnOrder) AS Discrepancy FROM products WHERE (UnitsInStock - UnitsOnOrder) = (SELECT MAX(UnitsInStock - UnitsOnOrder) FROM products);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the relationship between employee hire dates and their sales performance over the years.

SELECT EMP.EmployeeID, EMP.FirstName, EMP.LastName, YEAR(EMP.HireDate) AS HireYear, SUM(DTD.UnitPrice * DTD.Quantity * (1 - DTD.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees EMP JOIN orders ORD ON EMP.EmployeeID = ORD.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] DTD ON ORD.OrderID = DTD.OrderID GROUP BY EMP.EmployeeID, HireYear ORDER BY HireYear
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were delayed beyond the required date?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DelayedOrders FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all products with more units on order than in stock.
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsOnOrder > UnitsInStock;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product generated the highest revenue last month?

SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS Revenue FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE MONTH(o.OrderDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY od.ProductID ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders and average freight cost grouped by shipping region?
SELECT ShipRegion, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders, AVG(Freight) AS AvgFreightCost FROM orders GROUP BY ShipRegion;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee made the highest sales in the last month?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the product with the highest price-to-quantity ratio.
SELECT ProductID, ProductName, UnitPrice/NULLIF(UnitsInStock, 0) AS PriceToQuantity FROM products ORDER BY PriceToQuantity DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total revenue generated from each product.
SELECT ProductID, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How does employee salary correlate with their sales performance over the past year?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, employees.Salary, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY employees.Salary DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Can we identify any trends in the volume of orders over the past year?
SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM OrderDate) AS OrderMonth, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY OrderMonth ORDER BY OrderMonth;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 3 cities by total sales?
SELECT ShipCity, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of orders were delivered on or before the required date last month?

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN OrderID END) / COUNT(OrderID) * 100 AS OnTimeRate FROM orders WHERE MONTH(ShippedDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(ShippedDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?

SELECT SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] od;

SELECT DISTINCT SupplierID FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?

You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS DistinctProducts FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY Month;

SELECT EmployeeID, ShipCountry, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID, ShipCountry ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT AVG(Freight) FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-03-01' AND '2023-03-31';

SELECT SUM(o.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate > o.RequiredDate;

SELECT SupplierID, COUNT(ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY ProductCount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;

What percentage of orders were delivered on or before the required date each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(CASE WHEN ShippedDate <= RequiredDate THEN 1 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders GROUP BY Month;

SELECT MONTH(orders.OrderDate) AS Month, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2022 GROUP BY MONTH(orders.OrderDate) ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1;

List suppliers who have not shipped any orders in the last 6 months.

SELECT CompanyName FROM suppliers s WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE od.ProductID IN (SELECT ProductID FROM products p WHERE p.SupplierID = s.SupplierID) AND o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH));

Calculate the total discount given in Q4 2022.
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * od.Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT ShipCountry, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;

What percentage of orders are shipped with a freight cost lower than the average?

Who is the youngest employee handling the most sales?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) DESC, employees.BirthDate DESC LIMIT 1;

Calculate the age of employees handling the most orders this year.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(e.BirthDate) AS Age, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrdersHandled FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID WHERE YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY OrdersHandled DESC LIMIT 1

What is the customer retention rate per country?

SELECT customers.Country, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FROM orders WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN :start_date AND :end_date) / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID) FROM orders WHERE orders.OrderDate < :start_date) AS retention_rate FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.Country

Calculate the total discount given across all orders.
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * od.Discount) as TotalDiscount FROM [Order Details] od;

What is the year-over-year customer retention rate?

SELECT (CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' THEN CustomerID END) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN OrderDate < '2022-01-01' THEN CustomerID END), 0)) * 100 AS RetentionRate FROM orders;

What is the average customer lifetime value segmented by customer type?

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS supplier_lead_time, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName

Which products had the highest discount percentage but still generated significant sales this year?

SELECT ProductID, MAX(Discount) AS MaxDiscount, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM `Order Details` JOIN orders ON `Order Details`.OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE Discount > 0.1 AND YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the month-over-month change in units on order.
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(UnitsOnOrder) AS UnitsOnOrder FROM products GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m');

Identify orders that received a discount greater than 20%.
SELECT o.OrderID FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE od.Discount > 0.2;

Which employee processed the most orders?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) as OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT ShipVia, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;

Identify the top 5 suppliers with the shortest average delivery times.

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS AvgLeadTime FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName ORDER BY AvgLeadTime ASC LIMIT 5;

What is the total sales revenue generated by each supplier in the last year?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID JOIN suppliers ON products.SupplierID = suppliers.SupplierID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) - 1 GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID

Compare the total sales revenue for Q1 2022 vs Q1 2023.

SELECT 'Q1 2022' as Quarter, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) as TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = 2022 AND MONTH(OrderDate) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 UNION ALL SELECT 'Q1 2023' as Quarter, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = 2023 AND MONTH(OrderDate) BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders are shipped late each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(*) AS LateOrders FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate > RequiredDate GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the year-over-year growth in total sales from 2022 to 2023?

SELECT ((SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) FILTER (WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31')) - (SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) FILTER (WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'))) / SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount) FILTER (WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31')) AS Growth FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID;

Find the product with the longest uninterrupted gap in sales.

WITH ProductSales AS (SELECT ProductID, OrderDate, LAG(OrderDate) OVER (PARTITION BY ProductID ORDER BY OrderDate) AS PrevOrderDate FROM [Order Details]) SELECT ProductID, MAX(DATEDIFF(DAY, PrevOrderDate, OrderDate)) AS LongestGap FROM ProductSales GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY LongestGap DESC LIMIT 1;

You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the difference in average order value between 2021 and 2022?

SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2022 THEN [Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount) END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2022 THEN orders.OrderID END)) - (SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2021 THEN [Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount) END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2021 THEN orders.OrderID END)) AS AvgOrderValueDiff;
